verbs.description: slow - cooker [V: mashed] [ARG1: potatoes] sour cream and cream cheese give richness to these smooth make - ahead potatoes they are wonderful for thanksgiving or christmas dinner since there no last - minute mashing required —trudy vincent valles mines missouri
